about.title: Introduction
about.subTitle: Overview.
about.content: With over 12 years of experience in software engineering management and technical leadership, I've been pushing the boundaries of mobile and web development. Since 2016, I've specialized in the OTT video space, working with nearly all aspects of streaming media. I developed a groundbreaking shared Swift library for iOS/tvOS apps, led the tvOS and Roku platforms at fuboTV, and served as Engineering Lead for VOD Encoding and Operations. Currently, as Engineering Lead of Video Innovations, I focus on developing server-side multi-view systems and just-in-time transcoding solutions. My leadership approach is deeply rooted in my service with the United States Marine Corps, where I served as an Infantry Squad Leader with the rank of Sergeant. For more details about my work, visit https://awesome.video.

work.title: MY WORK
work.subTitle: Projects.
work.content: Following projects showcase my expertise in video streaming technologies and software engineering. Each project represents significant innovations in the OTT video space, demonstrating my ability to solve complex problems, work with cutting-edge technologies, and lead teams to deliver high-impact solutions.

0.name: JIT Transcoding & Packaging
0.description: A just-in-time transcoding and packaging solution for HEVC files, deployed in Kubernetes. This system optimizes streaming efficiency and quality, revolutionizing video delivery for OTT platforms.

1.name: Server-Side Multi-View
1.description: Innovative system that integrates multiple video feeds within a single player interface, revolutionizing content consumption and enhancing viewer experience for sports and live events.

2.name: VOD Encoding Pipeline
2.description: End-to-end system for encoding, packaging, and delivering VOD content in multiple formats (HLS, DASH) with DRM protection. Leverages AWS Spot Instances and container-based infrastructure to reduce costs by 70%.

blog.title: MY PRESENTATIONS
blog.subTitle: Talks & Articles.
blog.content: I regularly share my expertise in video streaming technologies through presentations, talks, and technical articles. These resources cover topics like video encoding optimization, streaming protocols, cloud-based media processing, and the future of OTT platforms. Visit my website at https://awesome.video for more in-depth technical content.
